thread.title: Trump again hits back at question of mental fitness

title: Trump again hits back at question of mental fitness
text:
Trump again hits back at question of mental fitness 12:26pm IST - 01:34 
U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday again attacked a new book suggesting he lacks the fitness and stability for office, declaring, ''Ronald Reagan had the same problem and handled it well. So will I.''   
U.S. President Donald Trump on Sunday again attacked a new book suggesting he lacks the fitness and stability for office, declaring, "Ronald Reagan had the same problem and handled it well. So will I."  //in.reuters.com/video/2018/01/08/trump-again-hits-back-at-question-of-men?videoId=380414021&videoChannel=101
